title: Turnaround
description:
Kevin talks about the #blacktranslivesmatter rally and march and Edith Gonzalez, Audrey Avera, Charles Busch, and Charissa Johnson share stories about high school sex, the E.R.A., a heart scare, and a deceitful family autobiography.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Lafayette Gilchrist, Edith Gonzalez, Olivia Oyama, Charles Busch, Anderson Paak, Charissa Johnson, Hot Chip, Audrey Avera, Kevin Allison)
